attributes.action: give tax breaks for public transport season ticket holders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Tax breaks for public transport season ticket holders

Employers should take off season ticket loans, before tax is calculated.  This would promote the use of public transport, and help out that tax payer.

I currently pay £3,520 Tunbridge wells – Paddington before I even start earning!
